name: Evil Mage

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list:
Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, misty step

spells: light, mage hand, shocking grasp, charm person, magic missile, hold person, misty step
description:
Evil mages (such as Iarno Albrek and Hamun Kost) hunger for arcane power and dwell in isolated places, where they can perform terrible magical experiments without interference.
Source: Lost Mine of Phandelver p. 57, The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy
